DOC.criteria: Study inclusion criterion study participant must : 1. meet Diagnostic Statistical ManualIV ( DSMIV ) alcohol abuse dependence diagnosis base Diagnostic Interview Schedule IV ( DISIV ) ; 2. consume weekly average least 24 standard drink baseline period include least 5 episode heavy drinking ; 3. agree seek additional alcohol substance abuse treatment study period ; 4. least 18 year age ; 5. sufficiently proficient English speaking ability interact effectively research interviewer . Individuals assess drug diagnosis severe alcohol diagnosis ( e.g. , cocaine dependence alcohol abuse , IV drug use ) , serious psychiatric diagnosis ( e.g. , uncontrolled schizophrenia major depression ) well meet criterion organic brain impairment , measure minimental status examination section DISIV preclude study participation . In addition , individual report current enrollment substance abuse treatment program , mandate substance abuse treatment court order , severely socially unstable ( e.g. , homeless ) also preclude study participation .
